title: Backup - Configure New Backup Job
description: A new server has been deployed, and it needs to be added to the nightly backup schedule.

tasks.description: Install the backup agent software on the new server.
In the backup console, create a new backup job for the new server.
Configure the job with the correct schedule, retention policy, and encryption settings, then run the first backup.
tasks.expected_outcome: The server is now being backed up according to the client's policy.
